revisions.rev:
{{Infobox Company | company_name = Vodafone D2 | company_logo = | company_type = [[Subsidiary]] of [[Vodafone|Vodafone Plc]] | slogan = make the most of now (German: ''Mach das Beste aus dem Augenblick!'') | foundation = 1990 as '''Mannesmann Mobilfunk GmbH'''
2002 rebranded '''Vodafone D2 GmbH''' | location = German headquarters in [[DÃ¼sseldorf]] | key_people = MD of German operations: [[Friedrich Joussen]] | industry = [[Telecommunication]]s | products = [[Prepaid mobile phone|Prepaid]] and [[postpaid]] [[mobile phone]]s | num_employees = Germany: approximately 9,000 | homepage = http://www.vodafone.de/ }} '''Vodafone D2''' is a [[mobile telephone]] company, operating in [[Germany]]. It is a non-listed, wholly owned subsidiary of [[Vodafone|Vodafone Plc]] (which is based in the [[United Kingdom]]). The company resulted from the 2000 takeover by Vodafone of the German operator [[Mannesmann|Mannesmann Mobilfunk GmbH]]. D2-Netz, the company's primary asset, was the second digital ([[GSM]]) network licensed in Germany. It was rebranded in 2002 to Vodafone D2. The Song "We are the people" from [[Empire of the sun]] in TV advertising campaing 2010 / 2011 became very popular in Germany (song charts).http://www.vodafone.com/content/index/press/local_press_releases/germany/2011/vodafone_campaignsonggoesplatinum.html Currently, the Vodafone D2 network serves both [[Prepaid mobile phone|prepaid]] and [[postpaid]] customers on [[GSM]] and [[UMTS]] (with [[HSDPA]]). In december 2010 Vodafone startet with LTE ([[Long Term Evolution]]) as the first German operator.http://www.vodafone-lte.de/ In February 2011 Vodafone Germany started with IPTVhttp://www.vodafone-iptv.de/ via DSL and VDSL connection. In April 2011 Vodafone Germany started to contribute a lot of [[Disney]] content via IPTV.http://www.vodafone.com/content/index/press/local_press_releases/germany/2011/vodafone_tv_withdisneycontent.html At the end of 2010 Vodafone had 36,676 million customers with mobile phone or mobile internet contract and 3,945 million customers with a DSL / VDSL connection,http://www.vodafone-angebote-news.de/7376-vodafone-in-deutschland-auf-wachtstumskurs-238000-dsl-kunden a very high market share, making it the largest operator in the country. Following [[T-Mobile]], Vodafone Germany starts pre-registration for the Apple [[iPhone 4s]] by September 12, 2011.http://www.netzwelt.de/news/88390-apple-iphone-5-vodafone-startet-vorregistrierung.html (german) ==References== {{Reflist}} {{Vodafone}} {{German mobile phone companies}} {{Telecommunications}} [[Category:Vodafone]] [[Category:Companies based in DÃ¼sseldorf]] [[Category:Mobile phone companies of Germany]] [[de:Vodafone D2]] {{Germany-stub}} {{Telecommunications-stub}}
